tool_description: Barcode generation, recognition, and conversion REST API  that supports 60+ types of linear, 2D, and postal barcodes.
name: Aspose BarCode Cloud
title: Aspose BarCode Cloud

api_list.name: ObjectExists

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File or folder path e.g. '/file.ext' or '/folder'

optional_parameters.name: versionId
optional_parameters.description: File version ID

optional_parameters.name: storageName
optional_parameters.description: Storage name

api_list.name: GetFilesList

optional_parameters.name: storageName
optional_parameters.description: Storage name

api_list.name: GetBarcodeGenerate

optional_parameters.name: Resolution
optional_parameters.description:
Resolution of the BarCode image.
One value for both dimensions.
Default value: 96 dpi.

optional_parameters.name: ImageWidth
optional_parameters.description: Width of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

optional_parameters.name: SupplementData
optional_parameters.description:
Supplement parameters.
Used for Interleaved2of5, Standard2of5, EAN13, EAN8, UPCA, UPCE, ISBN, ISSN, ISMN.

optional_parameters.name: TextLocation
optional_parameters.description:
Specify the displaying Text Location, set to CodeLocation.None to hide CodeText.
Default value: CodeLocation.Below.

optional_parameters.name: FontSizeMode
optional_parameters.description:
Specify FontSizeMode. If FontSizeMode is set to Auto, font size will be calculated automatically based on xDimension value.
It is recommended to use FontSizeMode.Auto especially in AutoSizeMode.Nearest or AutoSizeMode.Interpolation.
Default value: FontSizeMode.Auto.

optional_parameters.name: RotationAngle
optional_parameters.description:
BarCode image rotation angle, measured in degree, e.g. RotationAngle = 0 or RotationAngle = 360 means no rotation.
If RotationAngle NOT equal to 90, 180, 270 or 0, it may increase the difficulty for the scanner to read the image.
Default value: 0.

optional_parameters.name: SupplementSpace
optional_parameters.description: Space between main the BarCode and supplement BarCode.

optional_parameters.name: ImageHeight
optional_parameters.description: Height of the barcode image in given units. Default units: pixel.

optional_parameters.name: EnableEscape
optional_parameters.description:
Indicates whether explains the character "\" as an escape character in CodeText property. Used for Pdf417, DataMatrix, Code128 only
If the EnableEscape is true, "\" will be explained as a special escape character. Otherwise, "\" acts as normal characters.
Aspose.BarCode supports input decimal ascii code and mnemonic for ASCII control-code characters. For example, \013 and \\CR stands for CR.

optional_parameters.name: ResolutionY
optional_parameters.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Resolution' instead.

optional_parameters.name: SizeMode
optional_parameters.description:
Specifies the different types of automatic sizing modes.
Default value: AutoSizeMode.None.

optional_parameters.name: BarHeight
optional_parameters.description: Height of the barcode in given units. Default units: pixel.

optional_parameters.name: TextColor
optional_parameters.description:
Specify the displaying CodeText's Color.
Default value: Color.Black.

optional_parameters.name: TextSpace
optional_parameters.description:
Space between the CodeText and the BarCode in Unit value.
Default value: 2pt.
Ignored for EAN8, EAN13, UPCE, UPCA, ISBN, ISMN, ISSN, UpcaGs1DatabarCoupon.

optional_parameters.name: WideNarrowRatio
optional_parameters.description:
Wide bars to Narrow bars ratio.
Default value: 3, that is, wide bars are 3 times as wide as narrow bars.
Used for ITF, PZN, PharmaCode, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, IATA2of5, VIN, DeutschePost, OPC, Code32, DataLogic2of5, PatchCode, Code39Extended, Code39Standard

optional_parameters.name: BarColor
optional_parameters.description:
Bars color.
Default value: Color.Black.

optional_parameters.name: DimensionX
optional_parameters.description:
The smallest width of the unit of BarCode bars or spaces.
Increase this will increase the whole barcode image width.
Ignored if AutoSizeMode property is set to AutoSizeMode.Nearest or AutoSizeMode.Interpolation.

optional_parameters.name: NoWrap
optional_parameters.description:
Specify word wraps (line breaks) within text.
Default value: false.

optional_parameters.name: TwoDDisplayText
optional_parameters.description:
Text that will be displayed instead of codetext in 2D barcodes.
Used for: Aztec, Pdf417, DataMatrix, QR, MaxiCode, DotCode

optional_parameters.name: BorderWidth
optional_parameters.description:
Border width.
Default value: 0.
Ignored if Visible is set to false.

optional_parameters.name: BorderColor
optional_parameters.description:
Border color.
Default value: Color.Black.

optional_parameters.name: FilledBars
optional_parameters.description:
Value indicating whether bars are filled.
Only for 1D barcodes.
Default value: true.

optional_parameters.name: BorderVisible
optional_parameters.description:
Border visibility. If false than parameter Width is always ignored (0).
Default value: false.

optional_parameters.name: BarWidthReduction
optional_parameters.description: Bars reduction value that is used to compensate ink spread while printing.

optional_parameters.name: BackColor
optional_parameters.description:
Background color of the barcode image.
Default value: Color.White.

optional_parameters.name: AlwaysShowChecksum
optional_parameters.description: Always display checksum digit in the human readable text for Code128 and GS1Code128 barcodes.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Result image format.

optional_parameters.name: BorderDashStyle
optional_parameters.description:
Border dash style.
Default value: BorderDashStyle.Solid.

optional_parameters.name: Units
optional_parameters.description: Common Units for all measuring in query. Default units: pixel.

optional_parameters.name: EnableChecksum
optional_parameters.description:
Enable checksum during generation 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbology which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN, Codabar
Checksum always used: Rest symbology

optional_parameters.name: ValidateText
optional_parameters.description:
Only for 1D barcodes.
If codetext is incorrect and value set to true - exception will be thrown. Otherwise codetext will be corrected to match barcode's specification.
Exception always will be thrown for: Databar symbology if codetext is incorrect.
Exception always will not be thrown for: AustraliaPost, SingaporePost, Code39Extended, Code93Extended, Code16K, Code128 symbology if codetext is incorrect.

optional_parameters.name: ResolutionX
optional_parameters.description: DEPRECATED: Use 'Resolution' instead.

optional_parameters.name: TextAlignment
optional_parameters.description: Text alignment.

api_list.name: GetBarcodeRecognize

optional_parameters.name: AllowQRMicroQrRestoration
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine for QR/MicroQR to recognize damaged MicroQR barcodes.

optional_parameters.name: DetectEncoding
optional_parameters.description: A flag which force engine to detect codetext encoding for Unicode.

optional_parameters.name: AustralianPostEncodingTable
optional_parameters.description: Interpreting Type for the Customer Information of AustralianPost BarCode.Default is CustomerInformationInterpretingType.Other.

optional_parameters.name: storage
optional_parameters.description: The image storage.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: The image folder.

optional_parameters.name: AllowComplexBackground
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize color barcodes on color background as additional scan. Extremely slow mode.

optional_parameters.name: AllowSaltAndPepperFiltering
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize barcodes with salt and pepper noise type. Mode can remove small noise with white and black dots.

optional_parameters.name: ReadTinyBarcodes
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize tiny barcodes on large images. Ignored if AllowIncorrectBarcodes is set to True. Default value: False.

optional_parameters.name: SkipDiagonalSearch
optional_parameters.description:
Allows detector to skip search for diagonal barcodes.
Setting it to false will increase detection time but allow to find diagonal barcodes that can be missed otherwise.
Enabling of diagonal search leads to a bigger detection time.

optional_parameters.name: RectX
optional_parameters.description: Set X for area for recognition.

optional_parameters.name: Preset
optional_parameters.description:
Preset allows to configure recognition quality and speed manually.
You can quickly set up Preset by embedded presets: HighPerformance, NormalQuality,
HighQuality, MaxBarCodes or you can manually configure separate options.
Default value of Preset is NormalQuality.

optional_parameters.name: AllowRegularImage
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize regular image without any restorations as main scan. Mode to recognize image as is.

optional_parameters.name: AllowIncorrectBarcodes
optional_parameters.description:
Allows engine to recognize barcodes which has incorrect checksum or incorrect values.
Mode can be used to recognize damaged barcodes with incorrect text.

optional_parameters.name: CheckMore1DVariants
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize 1D barcodes with checksum by checking more recognition variants. Default value: False.

optional_parameters.name: Timeout
optional_parameters.description: Timeout of recognition process.

optional_parameters.name: ScanWindowSizes
optional_parameters.description:
Scan window sizes in pixels.
Allowed sizes are 10, 15, 20, 25, 30.
Scanning with small window size takes more time and provides more accuracy but may fail in detecting very big barcodes.
Combining of several window sizes can improve detection quality.

optional_parameters.name: AllowOneDFastBarcodesDetector
optional_parameters.description:
Allows engine for 1D barcodes to quickly recognize high quality barcodes which fill almost whole image.
Mode helps to quickly recognize generated barcodes from Internet.

optional_parameters.name: StripFNC
optional_parameters.description: Value indicating whether FNC symbol strip must be done.

optional_parameters.name: RegionLikelihoodThresholdPercent
optional_parameters.description:
Sets threshold for detected regions that may contain barcodes.
Value 0.7 means that bottom 70% of possible regions are filtered out and not processed further.
Region likelihood threshold must be between [0.05, 0.9]
Use high values for clear images with few barcodes.
Use low values for images with many barcodes or for noisy images.
Low value may lead to a bigger recognition time.

optional_parameters.name: AllowDecreasedImage
optional_parameters.description:
Allows engine to recognize decreased image as additional scan. Size for decreasing is selected by internal engine algorithms.
Mode helps to recognize barcodes which are noised and blurred but captured with high resolution.

optional_parameters.name: AllowWhiteSpotsRemoving
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize image without small white spots as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised image as well as median smoothing filtering.

optional_parameters.name: RectY
optional_parameters.description: Set Y for area for recognition.

optional_parameters.name: RectWidth
optional_parameters.description: Set Width of area for recognition.

optional_parameters.name: AllowMedianSmoothing
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to enable median smoothing as additional scan. Mode helps to recognize noised barcodes.

optional_parameters.name: AllowDatamatrixIndustrialBarcodes
optional_parameters.description:
Allows engine for Datamatrix to recognize dashed industrial Datamatrix barcodes.
Slow mode which helps only for dashed barcodes which consist from spots.

optional_parameters.name: RectHeight
optional_parameters.description: Set Height of area for recognition.

optional_parameters.name: Type
optional_parameters.description: The type of barcode to read.

optional_parameters.name: ChecksumValidation
optional_parameters.description:
Enable checksum validation during recognition for 1D barcodes.
Default is treated as Yes for symbologies which must contain checksum, as No where checksum only possible.
Checksum never used: Codabar
Checksum is possible: Code39 Standard/Extended, Standard2of5, Interleaved2of5, Matrix2of5, ItalianPost25, DeutschePostIdentcode, DeutschePostLeitcode, VIN
Checksum always used: Rest symbologies

optional_parameters.name: Similarity
optional_parameters.description:
Similarity coefficient depends on how homogeneous barcodes are.
Use high value for for clear barcodes.
Use low values to detect barcodes that ara partly damaged or not lighten evenly.
Similarity coefficient must be between [0.5, 0.9]

optional_parameters.name: AllowInvertImage
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to recognize inverse color image as additional scan. Mode can be used when barcode is white on black background.

optional_parameters.name: AllowOneDWipedBarsRestoration
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine for 1D barcodes to recognize barcodes with single wiped/glued bars in pattern.

optional_parameters.name: AllowDetectScanGap
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine to use gap between scans to increase recognition speed. Mode can make recognition problems with low height barcodes.

optional_parameters.name: MedianSmoothingWindowSize
optional_parameters.description: Window size for median smoothing. Typical values are 3 or 4. Default value is 3. AllowMedianSmoothing must be set.

optional_parameters.name: AllowMicroWhiteSpotsRemoving
optional_parameters.description: Allows engine for Postal barcodes to recognize slightly noised images. Mode helps to recognize slightly damaged Postal barcodes.

Barcodes.description: List of barcodes which are present in image.

items.description: Wrapper around Drawing.Point for proper specification.
